message.content:
1. The primary outcome was the impact of the strategy on quality of life.
2. Quality of life was measured using the MSIS-29 scale.
3. The measurement was taken at inclusion.
4. The measurement was taken again after six months.

messages.content:
Statement: The primary outcome was the impact of the strategy on quality of life (QoL) measured using the MSIS-29 scale at inclusion and after six months.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
